lines.text: You're the nanny. It's your job to fix things.
Whoa. Don't ever call me the Nanny. You can call me sir, you can call me boss or you can call me what all the ladies call me... Mr. Goodbar.
My mind is open and so are my eyes. Those ladies are liars and they're losers.
Tiffany, I went through a lot to set this up, now you're gonna meet these ladies - case closed.
[Voice activated door closes]
Well, it's nice to know something around here is listening to me.
Sasha, I know you want me in your calling circle, but I don't consider you as family or friends.
Community property doesn't cover what's in my head.
Neither does hair!
You always could make me laugh, Marion. Even in bed.
You feel ready for a good laugh right now?
I've got so much baggage.
I know. Some guys like a little extra baggage.
You have a very strong gum line.
Excuse me?
I always notice a person's smile. I'm a dental hygienist.
Oh. I guess if you go to work in an outfit like that, you'll never have to say "open wide"

[while on a date]
I just started my own business and I'm running a little low on cash, so a french restaurant is out. But I know a mice little Scottish place down the street... McDonald's?
[date drive off and leave]
I got cookies!
No problem ever got solved in bed. In fact as you get older, you'll find a lot of problems start in bed... Especially when you're playing in a different city every week...
I don't wanna toot my own horn, but I was captain of the chess team.
Somehow I get the impression you toot your own horn a lot.
